game.name: Forgotten Blood
game.categories: Single-player, Full controller support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Ventured into the Forgotten Valley, banished from a world consumed by the eternal blight. Descend through corrupted lands, seeking the cure to shatter the cycle of final death. Forgotten Blood is an action RPG open map with branching paths, ancestral relics, and buried lore.
